GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

POST /api/topics.description: adds a topic to the database and responds with the added topic

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: posts an article which is added to the database and responds with the posted article

exampleResponse.author: lurker
exampleResponse.title: All About Cheese
exampleResponse.body: There are many types of cheese. Most of they are yellow.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the article object with the requested id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: increments the votes field of the article object matching the requested id responding with the updated object

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array containing comments of the article matching the requested id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment for the requested id which is added to the database and responds with the posted comment

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves the user object with the requested username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: increments the votes field of the comment object matching the requested id responding with the updated object
